item.title: Using an Advanced Text Index Structure for Corpus Exploration in Digital Humanities
item.author: Tobias Englmeier, Marco Büchler, Stefan Gerdjikov, Klaus U. Schulz
item.description: Bibliography Blumer, A., Blumer, J., Haussler, D., McConnell, R., and Ehrenfeucht, A. “Complete inverted files for efficient text retrieval and analysis” . _Journal of the ACM (JACM)_ 34 (1987): 578-595. Büchler, M., Crane, G., Moritz, M., and Babeu, A. “Increasing recall for text re-use in historical documents to support research in the humanities” . In _Proceedings of 16th International Conference on Theory and Practice of Digital Libraries, (tpdl 2012):_ pp. 95–100 _Springer Berlin Heidelberg_ .
